custom-sql.sql: SELECT DISTINCT ContentTargeting_Analytics_AnalyticsEvent.classPK AS classPK, ContentTargeting_Analytics_AnalyticsEvent.referrerClassPK AS referrerClassPK, ContentTargeting_Analytics_AnalyticsEvent.elementId AS elementId, ContentTargeting_Analytics_AnalyticsEvent.eventType AS eventType, ContentTargeting_TrackingActionInstance.campaignId AS campaignId, ContentTargeting_TrackingActionInstance.alias_ AS alias FROM ContentTargeting_Analytics_AnalyticsEvent INNER JOIN ContentTargeting_TrackingActionInstance ON (ContentTargeting_TrackingActionInstance.elementId = ContentTargeting_Analytics_AnalyticsEvent.elementId) AND (ContentTargeting_TrackingActionInstance.eventType = ContentTargeting_Analytics_AnalyticsEvent.eventType) WHERE (ContentTargeting_Analytics_AnalyticsEvent.createDate >= ?) ORDER BY ContentTargeting_Analytics_AnalyticsEvent.createDate DESC
